## Shape class

Abstract base class for any kind of shapes

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare abstract class Shape<T extends ShapeCreationOptions = ShapeCreationOptions> extends Primitive 
```
**Extends:** [Primitive](doc/markdown/./scene.primitive.md)
